title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water.
Mix eggs and parmesan in a bowl.
Combine pasta, bacon, and egg mixture quickly.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Grill or pan-fry the chicken pieces.
Cook onions and tomatoes into a sauce.
Add cream and spices to the sauce.
Simmer chicken in sauce and serve with rice.
